'''2.2.3555''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.3557''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.3554''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on July 15, 2021.

== Changes ==
* Updated login process.
** This is an interim build release, which will cause all users have to re-login.
